# Cargo Trailer for RCMP
### Call for Tenders

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites proponents to submit a tender for the supply, inspection, and delivery of one (1) twenty (20) foot flat nose enclosed cargo trailer to the Ridge Meadows RCMP Detachment in Maple Ridge, British Columbia.

### Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date:** November 21, 2023, at 5:00 PM Pacific Time
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 27, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 22, 2024

### Delivery Requirements

The delivered trailer must meet the specified requirements, including:

* Cargo capacity of 20 feet
* Flat nose enclosed design
* Inspection prior to delivery

### Bidding Process

The tender will be awarded based on the lowest price compliant proposal. Proponents must submit their tender to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at E_Pacific_bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca by the tender closing date.

### Contract Requirements

The contract will be executed for a period of [24 months] with an option to purchase up to [2] additional trailers within this timeframe.

### Indigenous Procurement

The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this procurement opportunity. For more information on the Federal Indigenous Business Directory and eligibility criteria, please visit [www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory](http://www.canada.ca/indigenousbusinessdirectory).

### Solicitation Documents

The solicitation documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and any amendments, are available for download on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).

### Contact Information

For additional information, please contact:
Kathleen Nillas, RCMP E Division
Email: [kathleen.nillas@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:kathleen.nillas@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
Phone: (778) 290-2981
